column5: Hopefully these two will be punished in this world and the next.  http://ca.news.yahoo.com/blogs/dailybrew/more-trouble-salvation-army-2m-toys-disappear-155110707.html
There is always some despicable pig, waiting  in the wings, willing to take advantage of the good will and charity of others.
Other than that though he is probably a decent guy.

I have zero time for religion and I try to never do business with individuals that quote God to me BUT the Salvation Army is a virtuous organization that helps millions of people in very practical life altering ways. The double whammy of this debacle is that the actions of these two rats might lead people to reduce or eliminate their contributions to this exceptional organization. That would be a real travesty with horrible implications way beyond Christmas toys.
When they get to jail, the "Boys" will take care of them
doesnt surprise me at all...10 hail marys and ALL will be forgiven...

Hopefully the '' Managers ''  Directors '' Ceo's '' get Fired also...What ??? Did they not notice any of this activity going on  Sounds like the Upper management is just there to collect their hefty Paycheque.  :rolleyes:
what an odd thing to steal
